tool_description: Validates credit and debit card numbers using Luhn algorithm and identifies card type and issuer information.

card_number.description: Credit or debit card number to validate

check_luhn.description: Whether to perform Luhn algorithm validation

error_messages: Invalid card number format: Card number must contain only digits and be between 13-19 characters long.
Luhn algorithm failure: Card number fails Luhn checksum validation - verify the number is entered correctly.
Unsupported card type: Card number does not match any recognized card issuer patterns.
usage: Provide the card_number as a string of digits. Optionally set check_luhn to false to skip Luhn validation. Returns validation status and card details.

is_valid.description: Whether the card number is valid

card_type.description: Type of card (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, etc.)
